snippet: President Obama also said he didn’t see any evidence that Iran intended to attack the United States.
abstract: President Obama says in televised interview that he does not believe Israel has made a decision on whether to attack Iran to disrupt its nuclear program; he reiterates that diplomacy remains the preferred solution to resolving the standoff over what Western leaders believe is Tehran’s pursuit of nuclear weapons.
lead_paragraph: President Obama also said he didn’t see any evidence that Iran intended to attack the United States.

headline.seo: No Israeli Decision on Iran Attack, Obama Says
headline.main: No Israeli Decision on Iran Attack, Obama Says
headline.print_headline: Israel Is Not Preparing Iran Attack, Obama Says
